```{r}
# part 1
dt <- readLines("input.txt")
dt <- dt[!grepl("(ab)|(cd)|(pq)|(xy)", dt)]
dt <- dt[grepl("(\\w*[aeuio]\\w*){3,}", dt)]
dt <- dt[grepl("(.)\\1+", dt)]
length(dt)
```

```{r}
# part 2
dt <- readLines("input.txt")
dt <- dt[grepl("(..).*(\\1)", dt, perl = TRUE)]
dt <- dt[grepl("(.)(.)(\\1)", dt, perl = TRUE)]
length(dt)
```
